description:
GothamGo 2015: The "Modern" Garbage Collector by Verónica López

Verónica López is a mobile and back-end developer, a former physicist, and an engineer at Ardan Labs. She has extensive experience creating apps for government, finance and fashion, using Go as the back-end power source, which she started using while she led the back-end team of a digital agency in Mexico City, 2 years ago. She has been a speaker at GopherCon India and MagmaConf, and she hosts the Go Meetup in Mexico City.

See http://gothamgo.com/program#ver%C3%B3nica_l%C3%B3pez

This is a replacement (with better audio) of this earlier upload:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gk4OabD3FUE
